title: What role is Ivern, the green father gonna play?
body: What role is this guy gonna play? It can't be jg because someone like Nidalee or Lee and etc would lvl 2 invade him. I mean maybe he can top and he would have great synergy with Rengar because he can spawn a bush. (im not really sure just wanna know more about the new champ)

replies.body: oh ok ty everyone for the feedback :P

Jungle. Literally built for the jungle. He's a support jungler meaning that he carries by proxy. 

If you wanted to argue a different lane, I guess support.

he could go top lane against some of the melee champs due to his interaction with bushes. he would be like a weird {{champion:10}} 

{{item:3115}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3116}}

He is a jungler.

Kind of clear if you read any of the reveal, videos, ect.

Ivern is jungle and the best way to play him, in my humble opinion, is to invade the enemy jungle on bot side for a 4-man steal. Odds are team gets first blood and Ivern takes blue/red or Ivern takes red/blue and every camp that side without trouble.

Still jungle. He just needs to be careful and maybe ask his team for a ward or two on river entrances to avoid being invaded early.

He also appears to be a viable support.
I'm thinking he's a jungler intended for ranked 5 teams and LCS.  I can see him as a support as well.

I think he's going to be an awesome support. He can root the enemy with a free gap closer for jungler & ADC. He's ranged for 3 sec after touching brush (so always in the bot lane). He can shield his teammates or make them untargetable. He can smite without a jungle item so he's going to have a vision advantage on skuttle & wolves.
Jungle and maybe support.  Doubt he'll see any solo lane play.
